document_data.name: Korin
document_data.mainbody: '''Korin''' was a [[bard]] and a regular patron of the [[Beached Leviathan]], one of the most popular taverns of [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/193/Tavern Profile:The Beached Leviathan|60}}
document_data.Activities: Korin was known as the "chanteyman" of the Beached Leviathan because he always performed in the tavern. Korin was a friendly fellow, happy to tell stories and lead drinking songs and sea tunes. On occasion, he sang a dark dirge about a man who lost his family to [[devil]] cultists that showed real talent.
document_data.History: At some point before [[1479 DR]], Korin's family was murdered by [[Ashmadai]] cultists operating out of Neverwinter. Korin went to live in Neverwinter in the hopes of tracking down the cultists and get revenge.
